mapper.select: select small_product, small_product_id, small_product_posting_count, search_time from blli_small_product where small_product_status = 'confirmed' order by search_time asc nulls first
mapper.update: update blli_big_category set big_category_id = #{bigCategoryId} where big_category = #{bigCategory}
mapper.select: select big_category_id, big_category from blli_big_category
mapper.update: update blli_mid_category set mid_category_id = #{midCategoryId}, mid_category_main_photo_link = #{midCategoryMainPhotoLink}, small_product_count = ${smallProductCount} where mid_category = #{midCategory} and big_category = #{bigCategory}
mapper.insert: insert into blli_mid_category(mid_category, mid_category_main_photo_link, big_category, mid_category_id, small_product_count) values(#{midCategory}, #{midCategoryMainPhotoLink}, #{bigCategory}, #{midCategoryId}, #{smallProductCount})
mapper.select: select mid_category_id, mid_category from blli_mid_category
mapper.insert: insert into blli_small_product(small_product_id, small_product, mid_category, small_product_maker, small_product_main_photo_link, small_product_posting_count, naver_shopping_rank, product_register_day, mid_category_id, small_product_status, product_db_insert_date,detail_view_count,small_Product_Ranking) values(#{smallProductId}, #{smallProduct}, #{midCategory}, #{smallProductMaker}, #{smallProductMainPhotoLink}, #{smallProductPostingCount}, #{naverShoppingRank}, #{productRegisterDay}, #{midCategoryId}, 'unconfirmed', sysdate,0,0)

insert into blli_small_prod_buy_link(small_product_id, buy_link, buy_link_price, buy_link_delivery_cost, buy_link_option, seller) values(#{smallProductId}, #{buyLink}, #{buyLinkPrice}, #{buyLinkDeliveryCost}, #{buyLinkOption}, #{seller})
mapper.update: update blli_small_product set search_time = sysdate where small_product_id = #{smallProductId}
mapper.select: select * from blli_small_prod_buy_link where small_product_id = #{smallProductId} order by buy_link_price asc

select small_product_id, small_product, small_product_score from blli_small_product where mid_category = #{midCategory} and small_product_status = 'confirmed' and small_product != #{smallProduct} order by small_product_score desc
select count(*) from blli_small_product where mid_category = #{midCategory} and small_product_status = 'confirmed'
select ceil(count(*)/10) from blli_small_product where mid_category = #{searchWord} and small_product_status = 'confirmed'
select ceil(count(*)/10) from blli_small_product where small_product like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' and small_product_status = 'confirmed'

select mid_category,mid_category_info,mid_category_main_photo_link,mid_category_whentouse_min,mid_category_whentouse_max,big_category,mid_category_id from BLLI_MID_CATEGORY where #{babyMonthAge} >= mid_category_whentouse_min and #{babyMonthAge} <= mid_category_whentouse_max
select bnrmc.mid_category,bnrmc.mid_category_id,bnrmc.member_Id as noRecommendMidCategory from blli_member bm , BLLI_NOT_RECOMM_MID_CATEGORY bnrmc where #{memberId} = bnrmc.member_id

select * from (select rownum as rn,SMALL_PRODUCT, MID_CATEGORY,mid_CATEGORY_ID, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAKER, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MIN, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MAX, SMALL_PRODUCT_DIBS_COUNT, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAIN_PHOTO_LINK, SMALL_PRODUCT_SCORE, SMALL_PRODUCT_POSTING_COUNT, NAVER_SHOPPING_RANK, PRODUCT_REGISTER_DAY,small_product_id from BLLI_SMALL_PRODUCT where MID_CATEGORY_id = #{recommMid} and #{babyMonthAge} >= SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MIN and #{babyMonthAge} <= SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MAX order by SMALL_PRODUCT_DIBS_COUNT desc) where rn<3

select * from (select rownum as rn,SMALL_PRODUCT, MID_CATEGORY,mid_CATEGORY_ID, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAKER, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MIN, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MAX, SMALL_PRODUCT_DIBS_COUNT, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAIN_PHOTO_LINK, SMALL_PRODUCT_SCORE, SMALL_PRODUCT_POSTING_COUNT, NAVER_SHOPPING_RANK, PRODUCT_REGISTER_DAY,small_product_id from BLLI_SMALL_PRODUCT where MID_CATEGORY_id = #{recommMid} and #{babyMonthAge} >= SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MIN and #{babyMonthAge} <= SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MAX order by SMALL_PRODUCT_DIBS_COUNT desc) where rn=1
mapper.delete: delete from blli_member_dibs where member_id=#{memberId} and small_product_id = #{smallProductId}
mapper.update: update blli_small_product set small_product_dibs_count = small_product_dibs_count+1 where small_product_id=#{smallProductId}
update blli_small_product set small_product_dibs_count = small_product_dibs_count-1 where small_product_id=#{smallProductId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from blli_member_dibs where member_Id=#{memberId} and small_product_id = #{smallProductId}

select * from (select rownum as rn,SMALL_PRODUCT, MID_CATEGORY,mid_CATEGORY_ID, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAKER, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MIN, SMALL_PRODUCT_WHENTOUSE_MAX, SMALL_PRODUCT_DIBS_COUNT, SMALL_PRODUCT_MAIN_PHOTO_LINK, SMALL_PRODUCT_SCORE, SMALL_PRODUCT_POSTING_COUNT, NAVER_SHOPPING_RANK, PRODUCT_REGISTER_DAY,small_product_id from BLLI_SMALL_PRODUCT where MID_CATEGORY_id = #{value} order by SMALL_PRODUCT_SCORE asc) where rn <= 5
select small_product_posting_count from blli_small_product where small_product_id = #{value}

select mid_category_id,small_product_id,small_product_dibs_count,detail_view_count,naver_shopping_rank,product_register_day,product_db_insert_date from blli_small_product where small_product_status = 'confirmed'
select sum(buy_link_click_count) from blli_small_prod_buy_link where small_product_id = #{value}
select small_product_count from blli_mid_category where mid_category_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update blli_small_product set small_product_score = #{smallProductScore} where small_product_id=#{smallProductId}
mapper.select: select mid_category_id from blli_mid_category
select small_product_id,small_product_score from blli_small_product where mid_category_id = #{value} and small_product_status ='confirmed' order by small_product_score desc
mapper.update: update blli_small_product set small_product_ranking = #{smallProductRanking} where small_product_id = #{smallProductId}
update blli_small_product set detail_view_count = detail_view_count+1 where small_product_id = #{value}
update blli_small_prod_buy_link set buy_link_click_count = buy_link_click_count+1 where small_product_id = #{value}
